cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.4)

project("consoleapp420")

include(Reprojucer)


set(consoleapp420_jucer_FILE
  "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/consoleapp420.jucer"
)


jucer_project_begin(
  JUCER_VERSION "4.2.0"
  PROJECT_FILE "${consoleapp420_jucer_FILE}"
  PROJECT_ID "F8GnGq"
)

jucer_project_settings(
  PROJECT_NAME "consoleapp420"
  PROJECT_VERSION "1.0.0"
  PROJECT_TYPE "Console Application"
  BUNDLE_IDENTIFIER "com.yourcompany.consoleapp420"
  INCLUDE_BINARYDATA ON
)

jucer_project_files("consoleapp420/Source"
# Compile   Xcode     Binary    File

  x         .         .         "Source/foo.cpp"
)

)

  NAME "Debug"
  DEBUG_MODE ON

  OSX_BASE_SDK_VERSION "Use Default"

  OSX_ARCHITECTURE "Use Default"
)
